subject: Re: [junit] Junit Tests in a Jar file ?
msgSnippet: Please show us the exact command you use to launch JUnit. ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people
messageBody:
Please show us the exact command you use to launch JUnit.

>So said chrismm662 on 2003-06-23 --------------------
>Is it possible to execute junit tests inside a jar file ? When I put
>my jar file in the classpath the junit gui displays no tests but if I
>unjar it and put the class files into a directory on the classpath
>they appear without any problem ?
>
